definition: Lugu Lake
old name of a river in Jiangxi/place name
abbr. for Tianjin 天津 (also 津沽)
to buy/to sell
lake/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]

sentences.english: Lugu Lake is located in the north of Yun Nan province.
sentences.chinese: 泸沽湖在云南和四川交界处。

sentences.english: As the plan, our tour guide lead us to go to the Lugu Lake.
sentences.chinese: 根据行程安排，我们的导游会带我们去泸沽湖。

sentences.english: Lake Lugu, or "Xienami" in local dialect, is actually referring to Muhai, which means the sea of mother.
sentences.chinese: 泸沽湖，当地人称“谢纳咪”，即母海的意思。

sentences.english: Plunged into the embrace of Lugu Lake.
sentences.chinese: 沉迷在泸沽湖的怀抱里。

sentences.english: Lugu Lake, located in Yunnan Province, is 300 kilometers away from Lijiang County.
sentences.chinese: 泸沽湖位于云南境内，距离丽江300公里。

sentences.english: A generation ago, few outsiders had ever heard of Lake Lugu or the Mosuo.
sentences.chinese: 在上一代，少有外地人听说过泸沽湖或摩梭族。

definition: Lijiang prefecture-level city in northwest Yunnan
Daocheng county (Tibetan: 'dab pa rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)

Shangri-La (mythical location)/Shangri-La town and county in Dêqên or Diqing Tibetan autonomous prefecture 迪慶藏族自治州|迪庆藏族自治州[Di2 qing4 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Yunnan/formerly Gyeltang or Gyalthang, Chinese 中甸[Zhong1 dian4] in Tibetan province of Kham
Erhai Lake
Lake Mibgai Co or Miga Tso, in Dartsendo or Kangding 康定[Kang1 ding4], Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture, Sichuan
Meilixue or Meri snow mountains, with peaks up to 6000 m., in Diqing Tibetan autonomous prefecture 迪慶藏族自治州|迪庆藏族自治州[Di2 qing4 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan
Tiger Leaping Gorge on the Jinsha River 金沙江[Jin1 sha1 jiang1] in Lijiang Naxi autonomous county 麗江納西族自治縣|丽江纳西族自治县[Li4 jiang1 Na4 xi1 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4], Yunnan
Mt Yulong or Jade dragon in Lijiang 麗江|丽江, northwest Yunnan
Xinduqiao town in Dartsendo county 康定縣|康定县[Kang1 ding4 xian4], Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture, Sichuan
Jiuzhaigou Valley, Sichuan/Jiuzhaigou county, Sichuan

Gyeltang or Gyalthang town and county, former name of Shangri-La county 香格里拉縣|香格里拉县[Xiang1 ge2 li3 la1 xian4] in Dêqên or Diqing Tibetan autonomous prefecture 迪慶藏族自治州|迪庆藏族自治州[Di2 qing4 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Yunnan
Lijiang old town (in Yunnan)
Zoigê county (Tibetan: mdzod dge rdzong) in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang autonomous prefecture 阿壩藏族羌族自治州|阿坝藏族羌族自治州[A1 ba4 Zang4 zu2 Qiang1 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Sichuan
Namtso or Lake Nam (officially Nam Co), mountain lake at Nakchu in central Tibet
Sêrtar county (Tibetan: gser thar rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)
Dali Bai autonomous prefecture 大理白族自治州 in Yunnan
judicial officer/justice of the peace (old)
